commit message:
Add material dialog repo
Fix 'Failed to resolve' error

Remove IDE files
They'll only cause problems
Fix muzei settings navbar not being tinted and FC of clear cache menu

Merge pull request #2 from jereksel/clear-ide-stuff

Remove IDE files

Merge pull request #1 from jereksel/material-dialogs

Add material dialog repo

Merge pull request #3 from jereksel/abstract_new

Abstract class for Walls

Rewrite WallsFragment class
- Instead of Picasso targets we're using AsyncTask with callback
- Fix some inconsistency (sometimes target was using bitmap taken from ImageView instead of downloaded one)
- Remove useless download progress dialog
- Fix immersive losing when returning to activity or closing dialog

Merge pull request #5 from jereksel/WallsFragment

Rewrite WallsFragment class

Fix play store link
Remove profile selection tab in the header / Fix clear cache menu (again)

Merge pull request #8 from jereksel/centercrop

Fix showing large images (Fix #4)
Fix issue with changelog and translations
Fit() doesn't like to play nice
Add horizontal scrollview to the walls
Add 'pinch to zoom' feature to wallpapers
POC of fixing huge images preview.
Smooth scrolling to center of image

Merge pull request #12 from KowalskiOmniROM/patch-1

Update strings.xml

Massive settings enhancement + background color fix
- Enable settings for all Android versions
- Live preview
- Status bar tint
- Resetting

Add time-context headers to material drawer header

Got the idea from @xplodwild and OmniROM so credit to them for that :-)
https://github.com/omnirom/android_frameworks_base/commit/e6fe7ab50d622c9111144f4087fec0c4d23c9e28

Added a switch to make this optional and switch between stock header/time-context headers and poly

Stock time-context headers were all covered under creative common license

Credit to @nicholaschum for the poly images
Remove SnackBar during wall download (we show this GoogleProgressBar).

Make settings' text theme-able

- Localized material preference and color changer libs
Make FAB collapse after clicking any of the actions

This reverts commit 33e89ebeb364297aef055d6c7c415d5a653d0d7c.

Merge pull request #31 from flextrick/master

Add german translation and make grid dialog translatable

Add Papuh Live

Live Wallpaper created from walls based on user selections
All walls can be managed in the Papuh Live settings, as well as the update interval
If the update interval is set to 30 mins, the wall changes every 30 minutes

We have to use canvas for drawing the walls because the WallpaperManager destroyes the live wall engine
Some corrections are needed for the cropping/resizing/scaling of the wall. Some walls get zoomed in too much on the homescreen.

Fix bad placement of the wall on the homescreen (should be way better now)
Add ability to triple tap on the homescreen to switch the wall
